text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
Hey, guys. Know any good pranks 
up your sleeve?

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
Fuji-san loves tricks, right? The type 
where the victim finds it funny too. 
I wanna try pulling one off.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Now, I live every day of my life seriously. 
Practical jokes are not my expertise.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
…At night, when you're in bed… 
A cold hand suddenly grabs your ankle.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
Ohh! Now that'd be a shocker! 
Pretty high level trick to pull off—

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: —Wait, that really happened to you, right!? That's not fun or funny! Got something more… normal for me?

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
Ah, yeah! What about secretly 
replacing Tachyon's lab coat with 
my tokkofuku? Surprising, no?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: …She'd just wear it without a care.
